extendedInfo.description: Welcome Goal Achiever!This Apps' mission is to encourage, support, and reward you for taking meaningful daily action towards the attainment of your goals, big or small. To help you take consistent action long after the excitement you felt when you committed to a worthy goal has faded.One of the reasons you might not be successful at reaching a goal is because you did not take consistent and sustained action for a long enough period of time.This checklist was especially created to help you take daily consistent action over time."For changes to be of any true value, they've got to be lasting and consistent." - Tony Robbins"...we have to make good decisions, use discipline and be consistent for long enough to see the results we desire." - Darren Hardy"Success is nothing more than a few simple disciplines, practiced every day; while failure is simply a few errors in judgment, repeated every day.  It is the accumulative weight of our disciplines and our judgments that leads us either to fortune or failure" - Jim RohnThe idea is simple:1. Enter the actions you know you have to take daily to reach a goal. Like: Workout for 40 minutes, make 10 cold calls to prospective customers, send out 10 resumes to potential employers, write at least 10 pages for project, etc.2. Put the widget on your home screen. When an action is not yet completed it shows up in bright colored text. Once you check an action off the list the text becomes a lighter color.3. Your daily mission now becomes to see the list go from bright (in the morning) to gray (before going to bed). You can instantly see how far down your action list you are at a glance. This color change also signals that you had a successful day. A day in which you accomplished all the actions you needed to take you one day closer to your ultimate goals.A successful day, with all items checked, results in a green check mark placed on the calendar. Watching a series of check marks fill up the calendar, helps motivate you to stay consistent. There is an indicator on the main list screen that shows the number of consecutive successful days. This is your success streak. A streak with seven or more days turns this indicator green. This gives additional motivation for consistency.The home screen widget also serves as a constant reminder of the actions you need to take today. Each time you use your Android device you'll see the list and the amount of actions remaining.In short: Don't go to bed if your list is not completed. If bedtime is near and your list is not close to completion, get to work on what is left on the list!If you have any questions or comments send an email to:developer@dancingdroid.comIdeas for Uses:- Goal achievement- Motivation- Build and re-enforce good habits- Behavior modification- Build disciplineFeatures:- Simple visual design to remind you of your success actions- Number of unchecked high priority items displayed at top of on screen widget- Priority indicator to designate importance of items- Priority significance chooser. This allows you to specify which priority level items need to be completed to qualify for a daily check mark- Four widget sizes: 2x2, 2x3, 2x4, and 3x4- A variety of text and background color choices- Change text size of list and widget- Alarm on individual list items- Automatic daily list reset at the time you specify. You dictate when your day endsPermissions:- Modify/Delete SD card contents - Backup and restore list to SD card- Full Internet Access - Contact Google or AdMob to display advertisements- Control Vibrator - Make the device vibrate when alarmingSimilar Apps:Habit StreakMy Effectiveness HabitsAstrid Task/To-do ListTasko To Do List | Task ListAny.Do To Do List | Task ListGTasks: To Do List | Task ListOut of Milk Shopping ListLI Shopping ListSearch Terms:checklist, goals, success, achievement, tasks, task list, to do list, action, daily, consistency, compound effect, motivation.

reviews.title: Best checklist app ever!
reviews.comment: This is exactly what I\'ve been looking for: daily actions with long term trending. It\'s perfect and simple. The checklist automatically resets every day. I love the nice messages.
reviews.author: Sarah Struble

reviews.title: Great updates
reviews.comment: The original app was great, but with the new updates, the developers are adding everything the app lacked. This app is going to become the go-to for this type of list (if it isn\'t already).
reviews.author: Benjamin Suchy

reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
reviews.comment: Basic functionality with enough flexibility for my needs. Not very slick or intuitive, and the current day is out of sync with today accessed via the calendar, but it\'s still a great app.
reviews.author: Brad Hamm

reviews.title: Perfect!
reviews.comment: This app is exactly what I was looking for. It\'s so helpful and indeed motivates me to do more things! Love it!
reviews.author: Anna G

reviews.title: Outstanding app!!
reviews.comment: I am loving this app, can\'t belive it\'s free!! using it in conjunction with the principles of The Twelve Week Year program!
reviews.author: Brittani Berge

reviews.title: Extremely useful checklist.
reviews.comment: Helps me organize and  plan my to \"do list\" for the day. User friendly interface.
reviews.author: Sasha Sampaio

reviews.title: This app is very helpful
reviews.comment: The saying is \'it takes 30 days to create a new habit,\' this app is making it easier just to do that. I was hoping the dev. would add more options on the alarm part. Like an hourly alarm, weekly alarm, etc. And the list section, color coordinate into different categories, it would make progress tracking a lot easier.
reviews.author: Ellene H

reviews.comment: I love this app! Perfect for me to see my accomplishments. Would be great if I could set goals for future dates. It won\'t let me set goals for tomorrow or the next month but overall very helpful.
reviews.author: DaeEnz DAE

reviews.comment: I would love it if I could check things off from the widgets.  Also, would be nice if I could create multiple checklists and be able to set specific days for a checklist. I.e. my \"daily checklist\" changes according to the day. Or where specific tasks only show on days I set it to... if that makes sense\tCool
reviews.author: Ricky Martin

reviews.title: I chose this one.
reviews.comment: After two hours\' search, I decided to use this app. It\'s a great, motivating app! Thank you so much and I\'m so looking forward to the next version! I won\'t mind paying a few bucks if I can get away from the ads!  In the next version, I hope I could plan tomorrow\'s list the day before. I can\'t add anything before midnight for the next day, becuase it would make the percentage for the day drop. Please make a tomorrow\'s list separately, or at least make it possible to change the reset time earlier than midnight. I like to plan for the next day before I go to bed.
reviews.author: Julia Lee

reviews.title: Fantastic!
reviews.comment: Great app. Would give a fifth star if we could add things that are only done on certain days. For example, I do things on Saturday that I do not do the other days...is this coming soon?
reviews.author: Morgan Erickson

reviews.title: Great way to change habits
reviews.comment: A bit of a non standard interface but does what it says
reviews.author: Tony Maro

reviews.title: Motivate me everyday
reviews.comment: Have tried many similar ones but this is the best.  Its widget is simple and easy to.use.
reviews.author: jeff chuh

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: I want to give 5 stars, but there is one feature I would love to be added which is to be able to have multiple lists which would enable the user to organize daily success items into smaller groups of related items. In my case, I would like to separate my morning, day, and nighttime habits to follow into three separate groups.
reviews.author: Blake Horwitz

reviews.title: Good but ads
reviews.comment: No higher rates until no option to hide ads, even for money! Are you kidding: ads in habit-stimulating software?

reviews.title: Thanks!
reviews.comment: Perfect, just what I needed, thanks!
reviews.author: Fiona Dwyer

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: Simple and effective. Perfect for tracking my physio exercises.
reviews.author: Catherine Potterton

reviews.comment: New updates allowing the calendar to show partial completion are FANTASTIC. Great app!
reviews.author: Josh Boykin

reviews.title: good
reviews.comment: a
reviews.author: Ng qin shen

reviews.title: Practical and functional
reviews.comment: Great idea Terry!
reviews.author: King Hao
